price: 8. Zij hadden niets tegen hen, behalve dan dat zij in Allah geloofden, de Almachtige, Die alle lof waardig is!
arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā naqamū min'hum illā an yu'minū bil-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
